jd: From: bala, Millennium Infotech bala@mitiweb.com Reply to: bala@mitiweb.com Hi Professional,Hope you are doing well.We are looking for Business Analyst with Workday HCM and Payroll Experience at Augusta, Maine.This requirement need State Client Experience.Must have 10+ years of experienceKey Resonsibilities:·Monitoring/Supporting/Researching Data Quality/Data Cleanup with Stakeholders·Data Validation·Ticket Management (JIRA)·Eliciting, analyzing, documenting, validating, and communicating business requirements·General project documentation (i.e. meeting notes, drafting proposals)·General support through testing phases: researching issues, providing guidance on defect resolution·Other Project Support tasks as identified Required Skills:·Exceptional written and verbal communication skills·Strong analytical skills·Proficient with Excel (VLOOKUP's, pivot tables, concatenations, etc.)·Excellent active listening skills·Ability to clearly articulate messages to various audiences·Active listening skills·Ability to influence others·Flexibility and adaptability; ability to work in ambiguous situations at all levels of the organization·Problem solving and root cause analysis skill·Ability to synthesize multiple sources of data/information and compile into a cohesive presentation
